item.title: Centos_install_kubernetes
item.description: CentOS 7.5(minimal) 安装Kubernetes (kubeadmin方式) 安装基础常用包 1 yum install net-tools bash-completion yum-utils 关闭firewalld 1 2 3 systemctl stop firewalld && systemctl disable firewalld setenforce 0 sed -i 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/g' /etc/selinux/config 设置h
